Post-Match Reflections: ‘It’s one of those games that when you have all those things working against you at one time, you usually have a scary night,’ Portland head coach Chauncey Billups remarked.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Philadelphia 76ers center Joel Embiid chipped in a game-high 37 points on 12-of-21 shooting from the field and 12-of-13 shooting from the charity stripe, nine rebounds, and three assists.
The Trail Blazers stayed competitive in the first quarter, but by the halftime break were already trailing double digits, 64-54.
Portland fell behind by as many as 27 points in the contest's fourth frame.
The victory improves the 76ers to 13-17 on the season, while the loss plummets Portland to 11-21, the sixth-worst record in the league.
